prompts.sure_hide: Are you sure you want to unpublish this post?
prompts.no_publish: Posts can only be published from the approval module.
prompts.sure_lost: Are you sure? All changes you have made will be lost.
prompts.sure_del_cat: Are you sure? You may experience troubles deleting this if there are posts still linked to it.
prompts.logout: Are you sure you want to logout?
prompts.logout_others: Are you sure you want to logout of other devices? Your session will me maintained on this device.

ins.file_upload: Drop or click to select file.
ins.upload: Please upload {{figure}} {{category}} file of size of at most {{size}}KB
ins.minmax: Please enter a number between {{min}} and {{max}} inclusive.

upload.nofile: File could not be obtained, please try again.
upload.pref: Preferrably, by clicking the upload icon.
upload.exceed: File size exceeds maximum limit of {{size}}KB

errors.default: A server error was encountered. please try again.
errors.no_conn: A server-side error was encountered. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.you_not_allowed_sign_in: You are not allowed to sign in to this profile.
errors.wrong_request: There is an error in your request.
errors.read_only: You cannot make any changes to this site because your account is tagged "Read-Only".
errors.no_read_only: You cannot update your own read-only attribute.
errors.no_delete_account: You cannot delete your own account.
errors.banned: DELETE, TRUNCATE, and DESCRIBE keywords are banned from being used in your query.
errors.f_err_1: File does not exist at provided path for processing.
errors.f_err_2: Image processing encountered an unknown error.

success.logout_others: You have successfully logged your account out of other devices.
success.new_account: New account created. You can assign roles to the account from the accounts table.

dash.title: Admin
dash.login_success: You have successfully logged into the admin dashboard.
dash.li_1: Top right, you can switch between light and dark themes.
dash.li_2: On the side-bar (left), you can view and edit your details, logout, and also access the various modules you have been authorised to.
dash.li_3: You are on a read-only account meant for demo and monitoring. You cannot make any change to this application.
dash.li_4: Double-click on cells of editable columns (columns with pen icon) to edit the cells.

admin.new_username_ins: Username must have only alphanumeric, dash, and/or underscore characters, and must be of length 4 - 30.
admin.new_pass_ins: Password must contain at least an uppercase, lowercase, special, and a number, and must  be of length 8 - 100.
admin.title: Choose a title
admin.title_ins: Must not contain special characters and must be at most 100 characters long.
admin.slug_ins: You can modify your slug here. Only alphanumeric, lowercase and hyphen characters are allowed.

post.title_err: Title must not contain special characters and must be at most 100 characters long. Must contain at least an alphabet.
post.title: Title
post.slug_err: Only alphanumeric, lowercase and hyphen characters are allowed in slug.
post.all_sections_added: All sections have been added already.
post.no_content: No content added to this post yet.
post.meta_err: There is an error in the metadata section of your form.
post.content_err: There is an error in the content section of your form. All 'body' fields are required.
post.content_err2: Content is required if this post is intended for publishing.
